sentences.sentence: It is true, I was always a fine starched-up gentleman!
sentences.translation: 说实在的，我一向是一个上了浆的漂亮的绅士！

sentences.sentence: My clothes are not starched enough.
There is a starched, stilted feeling in the tepid evening air as, almost strangers, they stand, "strangely together, on a new pinnacle of existence".
sentences.translation: 在微热的空气中有一种僵硬、凝固的感觉，他们几乎陌生人般的站着，“奇怪的一起站在一个新的生活顶点上”。
